= Download Soar =

The current stable version of Soar is *9.3.1*.

This release of Soar continues the 9.3 line which includes modules for reinforcement learning (RL), episodic memory (EpMem), and semantic memory (SMem), as well as everything from previous versions of Soar. It includes many bugfixes, a major reworking of working memory activation, and under-the-hood improvements to support very long agent runs. All learning mechanisms are disabled by default.

[ReleaseNotes#9.3.1 Here are full release notes for the 9.3.1 release].

= Prerequisites = 

Downloading and installing [http://java.sun.com Java] is required since most users will want to use the Soar Java Debugger and other Soar components written in Java. 

* You can download the [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp latest version of the Sun JRE or JDK here]. 

*Important*: the 64-bit version of Soar require the 64-bit version Java!  Make sure to download the correct one.

=== Usage ===

  # Download
  # Extract to the folder of your choice
  # Navigate to the folder you extracted to
  # Double click batch/shell/command files such as `Soar Java Debugger`.

== Other Versions ==

Old, unsupported versions of Soar are archived on the [SoarSoftware Soar software page].
